comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: I20050218-1600

When expanding a category on the "site map" page of the site editor i get a
widget is disposed error.  If you close the editor down and open it back up
again the error is gone.  This only seems to happen once per session.

The error goes away if you have the outline view open in your current
perspective.  How odd...

This seems to have something to do with initialising the FeatureModelManager
inside the update of the tree (which i guess in turn updates the tree).  if you
comment out the bit of code that checks if the feture is valid in
SiteLabelProvider#getImage the error goes away.

Believe this is the problem that was fixed with M5a.  Please retry on M5a to 
confirm and let us know

Created an attachment (id=18160)
Site Editor

The item has no text and has the wrong icon.

Problem was as in comment 2.
Fix released.
